name: Taco Tuesday Special
description: Three classic tacos with your choice of protein, topped with fresh salsa and cheese. Perfect for a quick, craveable meal!

name: Salsa Fiesta
description: A vibrant platter of tortilla chips served with three house-made salsas: mild tomato, medium verde, and fiery habanero.

name: Cheesy Nights
description: Golden fried cheese bites with a creamy dipping sauce. Melty, gooey, and perfect for late-night cravings.

name: Chipotle Chicken Crunchwrap
description: Grilled chicken, chipotle sauce, lettuce, and cheese wrapped in a crispy tortilla. Bold, spicy, and smoky.

name: Elote Loco
description: Creamy, cheesy, chili-laced corn on the cob, finished with lime and cilantro.

name: Mac & Melt Bites
description: Cheesy macaroni bites, lightly fried and served with a mild dipping sauce.

name: Firecracker Quesadilla
description: A quesadilla loaded with pepper jack cheese, jalape√±os, and a spicy chipotle drizzle.

name: Veggie Crunch Bowl
description: A fresh bowl of greens, roasted veggies, and crispy tortilla strips, tossed in a tangy lime vinaigrette.
